title: Reporting a player after-game
body:
So I finished a game and afterwards one of the enemies added me and started talking shit. I was wondering where I need to post the chat records in order to get this to Riot. Or even if I need to post them anywhere at all. I checked on Riot support but I couldn't find a relevant category for this.


Username is blanked for the sake of the user.
http://imgur.com/a/Vk2De

replies.body:
Go ahead and submit that ticket. There's no relevant category, so you just have to pick something and they will forward the ticket to a Player Behavior Specialist.

When I do it, I just file it under account management > missing stats.
If it was me banned straight up no messing round tbh...
